tool_description: Aggregates and consolidates fill reports from multiple venues to provide unified execution summaries and calculate average execution prices.

order_ids.description: List of order IDs to aggregate fills for

time_window_start.description: Start time for fill aggregation window

time_window_end.description: End time for fill aggregation window

group_by_symbol.description: Whether to group results by trading symbol

include_venue_breakdown.description: Whether to include per-venue execution details

error_messages: No fills found: None of the specified order IDs have fill data in the time window.
Invalid time window: Start time must be before end time.
Order data unavailable: Some order IDs cannot be accessed or do not exist.
Time window too large: Time window cannot exceed 30 days.
usage: Provide order IDs to aggregate fills. Optionally specify time window and grouping preferences for customized reporting.

total_filled_quantity.description: Total quantity filled across all orders

total_fill_value.description: Total monetary value of all fills

symbols_traded.description: List of symbols that were executed

venues_used.description: List of venues where fills occurred
